creator: apache@matt.mchenryfamily.org
text:
lines 49 and 69 of the 'ant' sh script are:

  saveddir=`pwd`
  cd $saveddir

This 'cd' command fails if ant is run from a directory whose name contains spaces:

% pwd
/private/tmp/foo bar
% ant
/usr/local/bin/ant: cd: string not in pwd: /tmp/foo [69]

Line 69 should instead read:

  cd "$saveddir"

Note that this bug does not manifest itself all the time, as lines 36-70 are
only reached if the user has not defined $ANT_HOME.
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 9550 ***
creator: bodewig@apache.org
